message:
1. Lakshmipur e pray 10 spot e shibir er michil. Gari vhangchur. Dhaka-raypur, dhaka-ramgoti, dhaka-ramgonj road oborod. Jonomanob sunno town.
2. Cp arrest howar protibaad a aaj Coxsbazar shibir prodhan shodok a bishaal bikkhub michil ber kore.michil karider choke aaj agoon dekheche Coxsbazar bashi.bikkhubdo chatro ra michil sheshe besh koyekti gaadi vangchor kore.
